mapper.select:
select s.name AS shop_id,cn.contract_no_id AS contract_no_id , cn.status AS STATUS, n.province AS province, na.city AS city, nat.district AS district, cn.contract_no_amt as contract_no_amt
from contract_no cn , shop s, nation n , nation na, nation nat
WHERE cn.create_by_adm=#{createByAdm} and cn.shop_id=s.shop_id AND cn.province=n.id AND cn.city=na.id AND cn.district=nat.id
AND cn.shop_id=#{shopId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract_no ( province , city , district , street , shop_id , status , create_by_adm , contract_no_amt ) VALUES ( #{province} , #{city} , #{district} , #{street} , #{shopId} , #{status} , #{createByAdm} , #{contractNoAmt} )
